pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "PPG" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
shared LocalTZ = let
  Local = "Asia/Singapore" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any]
in
  Local;
shared TBU = let
  TBU = "Multiple" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  TBU;
shared WIP_Job = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT SYSDATE                                                 extract_date, 
       from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
       mp.organization_code, 
       wdjv.wip_entity_id, 
       wdjv.creation_date,
       wdjv.wip_entity_name                                    job_number, 
       wdjv.description                                        job_description, 
       wdjv.primary_item_id, 
       Decode (wdjv.firm_planned_flag, 1, 'Yes', 
                                       'No')                   firm_planned_flag 
       , 
       Decode (wdjv.job_type, 1, 'Standard', 
                              'Non-Standard')                  job_type, 
       (SELECT msi.segment1 
        FROM   inv.mtl_system_items_b msi 
        WHERE  msi.organization_id = mp.organization_id 
               AND msi.inventory_item_id = wdjv.primary_item_id 
               AND ROWNUM = 1) 
       assembly_item_number, 
       wdjv.bom_revision                                       job_bom_revision, 
       (SELECT wdj.source_code 
        FROM   apps.wip_discrete_jobs wdj 
        WHERE  wdj.wip_entity_id = wdjv.wip_entity_id 
               AND wdj.organization_id = mp.organization_id)   job_source, 
       wdjv.class_code,
       wdjv.status_type_disp                                   job_status, 
       wdjv.start_quantity, 
       wdjv.scheduled_start_date, 
       wdjv.scheduled_completion_date,
       (SELECT Min(wop.first_unit_start_date) 
        FROM   apps.wip_operations wop 
        WHERE  wop.wip_entity_id = wdjv.wip_entity_id ) first_unit_start_date,
       (SELECT Max(wop.date_last_moved) 
        FROM   apps.wip_operations wop 
        WHERE  wop.wip_entity_id = wdjv.wip_entity_id ) last_moved_date, 
       wdjv.net_quantity, 
       nvl(wdjv.quantity_completed,0) quantity_completed, 
       nvl(wdjv.quantity_scrapped,0) quantity_scrapped, 
       nvl(wdjv.quantity_remaining,0) quantity_remaining, 
       wdjv.project_number, 
       wdjv.kanban_card_number, 
       wdjv.lot_number, 
       (SELECT order_number 
        FROM   apps.oe_order_headers_all 
        WHERE  header_id = wdjv.attribute1)                    sales_order_dff, 
       (SELECT line_number 
        FROM   apps.oe_order_lines_all 
        WHERE  line_id = wdjv.attribute2) 
       sales_order_line_dff, 
       wdjv.attribute7 service_request_dff, 
       wdjv.attribute10                                        assembly_sn_dff, 
       wdjv.date_released, 
       wdjv.date_completed, 
       wdjv.date_closed, 
       wdjv.demand_class, 
       wdjv.completion_subinventory,
       (select concatenated_segments from apps.mtl_item_locations_kfv mil 
       where mil.organization_id = mp.organization_id 
       and mil.inventory_location_id = wdjv.completion_locator_id) completion_locator,
       fu1.user_name                                           job_created_by, 
       fu2.user_name 
       job_last_updated_by 
FROM   apps.wip_discrete_jobs_v wdjv, 
       apps.mtl_parameters mp, 
       applsys.fnd_user fu1, 
       applsys.fnd_user fu2 
WHERE  MP.organization_code = '"&ORG&"' 
       AND mp.organization_id = wdjv.organization_id
       AND fu1.user_id = wdjv.created_by 
       AND fu2.user_id = wdjv.last_updated_by
       "
, CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"JOB_NUMBER", "Job Number"}, {"JOB_DESCRIPTION", "Job Description"}, {"FIRM_PLANNED_FLAG", "Firmed Job"}, {"JOB_TYPE", "Job Type"}, {"ASSEMBLY_ITEM_NUMBER", "Assembly Item Number"}, {"JOB_BOM_REVISION", "BOM Revision"}, {"JOB_SOURCE", "Source"}, {"CLASS_CODE", "Class Code"}, {"JOB_STATUS", "Job Status"}, {"START_QUANTITY", "Quantity"}, {"SCHEDULED_START_DATE", "Scheduled Start Date"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}, {"SCHEDULED_COMPLETION_DATE", "Scheduled Completion Date"}, {"LAST_MOVED_DATE", "Last Moved Date"}, {"FIRST_UNIT_START_DATE", "First Unit Start Date"}, {"NET_QUANTITY", "Net Quantity"}, {"QUANTITY_COMPLETED", "Completed Quantity"}, {"QUANTITY_SCRAPPED", "Scrapped Quantity"}, {"QUANTITY_REMAINING", "Remaining Quantity"}, {"PROJECT_NUMBER", "Project Number"}, {"KANBAN_CARD_NUMBER", "Kanban Card Number"}, {"LOT_NUMBER", "Lot Number"}, {"DATE_RELEASED", "Released Date"}, {"DATE_COMPLETED", "Completed Date"}, {"DATE_CLOSED", "Closed Date"}, {"DEMAND_CLASS", "Demand Class"}, {"JOB_CREATED_BY", "Created By"}, {"JOB_LAST_UPDATED_BY", "Last Updated By"}, {"COMPLETION_SUBINVENTORY", "Completion Subinventory"}, {"COMPLETION_LOCATOR", "Completion Locator"}, {"SALES_ORDER_DFF", "Sales Order DFF"}, {"SALES_ORDER_LINE_DFF", "Sales Order Line DFF"}, {"SERVICE_REQUEST_DFF", "Service Request DFF"}, {"ASSEMBLY_SN_DFF", "Assembly Serial Number DFF"}}),
  ConvertToList = Table.AddColumn(#"Renamed columns", "ClassCodeToList", each Text.ToList([Class Code])),
  LowerCaseChars = {"a".."z"},
  // add Character.FromNumber(8203) to make the column unique
  AddInvisibleChars = Table.AddColumn(ConvertToList, "AddInvisibleChars", each List.Transform(
            [ClassCodeToList], 
            each 
            if 
            List.Contains(#"LowerCaseChars", _) 
            then 
            _ & Character.FromNumber(8203) 
            else _
            )),
  // Add case sensitive column as result of adding invisible characters Character.FromNumber(8203)
  AddCaseSensitiveColumn = Table.AddColumn(AddInvisibleChars, "Class Code CS", each Text.Combine([AddInvisibleChars])),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(AddCaseSensitiveColumn, {{"Class Code CS", type text}, {"Completed Quantity", type number}, {"Scrapped Quantity", type number}, {"Remaining Quantity", type number}}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed column type", {"ClassCodeToList", "AddInvisibleChars"}),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns 1";
shared WIP_Value = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true,
    Query="
      SELECT
         sysdate extract_date,
         from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
         we.wip_entity_name,
         we.wip_entity_id,
         mp.organization_code,
         oap.period_name,
         wpb.acct_period_id,
         oap.period_start_date,
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_overhead_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_resource_in),
         SUM(wpb.tl_resource_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_resource_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_outside_processing_in),
         SUM(wpb.tl_outside_processing_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_outside_processing_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_overhead_in),
         SUM(wpb.tl_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_overhead_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_overhead_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_overhead_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_resource_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_resource_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_resource_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_outside_processing_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_outside_processing_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_outside_processing_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_overhead_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_overhead_var)
      FROM
         apps.wip_period_balances wpb,
         inv.mtl_parameters mp,
         apps.wip_entities we,
         apps.org_acct_periods oap
      WHERE
         mp.organization_id = we.organization_id 
         AND wpb.wip_entity_id = we.wip_entity_id 
         AND OAP.organization_id = we.organization_id 
         AND oap.acct_period_id = wpb.acct_period_id
         AND mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
      GROUP BY
        we.wip_entity_name,
         we.wip_entity_id,
         mp.organization_code,
         oap.period_name,
         wpb.acct_period_id,
         oap.period_start_date
    ", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_VAR)", "TL Material Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_OUT)", "TL Material Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "TL Material Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "TL Material Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_RESOURCE_VAR)", "TL Resource Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_VAR)", "TL OSP Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "TL Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_VAR)", "PL Material Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "PL Material Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_RESOURCE_VAR)", "PL Resource Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_VAR)", "PL OSP Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "PL Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_RESOURCE_IN)", "TL Resource Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_RESOURCE_OUT)", "TL Resource Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OVERHEAD_IN)", "TL Overhead Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "TL Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_IN)", "TL OSP Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_OUT)", "TL OSP Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_IN)", "PL Material Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OUT)", "PL Material Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_IN)", "PL Material Overhead Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "PL Material Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_RESOURCE_IN)", "PL Resource Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_RESOURCE_OUT)", "PL Resource Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OVERHEAD_IN)", "PL Overhead Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "PL Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_IN)", "PL OSP Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_OUT)", "PL OSP Output"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"WIP_ENTITY_NAME", "Job Number"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "Period Name"}, {"PERIOD_START_DATE", "Period Start Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared WIP_Job_TBU = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT SYSDATE                                                 extract_date, 
       from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
       mp.organization_code, 
       wdjv.wip_entity_id, 
       wdjv.creation_date,
       wdjv.wip_entity_name                                    job_number, 
       wdjv.description                                        job_description, 
       wdjv.primary_item_id, 
       Decode (wdjv.firm_planned_flag, 1, 'Yes', 
                                       'No')                   firm_planned_flag 
       , 
       Decode (wdjv.job_type, 1, 'Standard', 
                              'Non-Standard')                  job_type, 
       (SELECT msi.segment1 
        FROM   inv.mtl_system_items_b msi 
        WHERE  msi.organization_id = mp.organization_id 
               AND msi.inventory_item_id = wdjv.primary_item_id 
               AND ROWNUM = 1) 
       assembly_item_number, 
       wdjv.bom_revision                                       job_bom_revision, 
       (SELECT wdj.source_code 
        FROM   apps.wip_discrete_jobs wdj 
        WHERE  wdj.wip_entity_id = wdjv.wip_entity_id 
               AND wdj.organization_id = mp.organization_id)   job_source, 
       wdjv.class_code,
       wdjv.status_type_disp                                   job_status, 
       wdjv.start_quantity, 
       wdjv.scheduled_start_date, 
       wdjv.scheduled_completion_date,
       (SELECT Min(wop.first_unit_start_date) 
        FROM   apps.wip_operations wop 
        WHERE  wop.wip_entity_id = wdjv.wip_entity_id ) first_unit_start_date,
       (SELECT Max(wop.date_last_moved) 
        FROM   apps.wip_operations wop 
        WHERE  wop.wip_entity_id = wdjv.wip_entity_id ) last_moved_date, 
       wdjv.net_quantity, 
       nvl(wdjv.quantity_completed,0) quantity_completed, 
       nvl(wdjv.quantity_scrapped,0) quantity_scrapped, 
       nvl(wdjv.quantity_remaining,0) quantity_remaining, 
       wdjv.project_number, 
       wdjv.kanban_card_number, 
       wdjv.lot_number, 
       (SELECT order_number 
        FROM   apps.oe_order_headers_all 
        WHERE  header_id = wdjv.attribute1)                    sales_order_dff, 
       (SELECT line_number 
        FROM   apps.oe_order_lines_all 
        WHERE  line_id = wdjv.attribute2) 
       sales_order_line_dff, 
       wdjv.attribute7 service_request_dff, 
       wdjv.attribute10                                        assembly_sn_dff, 
       wdjv.date_released, 
       wdjv.date_completed, 
       wdjv.date_closed, 
       wdjv.demand_class, 
       wdjv.completion_subinventory,
       (select concatenated_segments from apps.mtl_item_locations_kfv mil 
       where mil.organization_id = mp.organization_id 
       and mil.inventory_location_id = wdjv.completion_locator_id) completion_locator,
       fu1.user_name                                           job_created_by, 
       fu2.user_name 
       job_last_updated_by
       FROM
    apps.wip_discrete_jobs_v    wdjv,
    apps.mtl_parameters         mp,
    applsys.fnd_user            fu1,
    applsys.fnd_user            fu2,
    apps.mtl_system_items_b     msi 
WHERE
        mp.organization_id = msi.organization_id
    AND msi.inventory_item_id = wdjv.primary_item_id
    AND mp.organization_id = wdjv.organization_id
    AND fu1.user_id = wdjv.created_by
    AND fu2.user_id = wdjv.last_updated_by
    AND EXISTS (
        SELECT
            1
        FROM
            apps.mtl_item_categories_v mic
        WHERE
                mic.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
            AND mic.organization_id = msi.organization_id
            AND mic.category_set_name IN (
                'Product',
                'ORG Product'
            )
            AND mic.segment1 = '"&TBU&"'
    )
       "
, CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"JOB_NUMBER", "Job Number"}, {"JOB_DESCRIPTION", "Job Description"}, {"FIRM_PLANNED_FLAG", "Firmed Job"}, {"JOB_TYPE", "Job Type"}, {"ASSEMBLY_ITEM_NUMBER", "Assembly Item Number"}, {"JOB_BOM_REVISION", "BOM Revision"}, {"JOB_SOURCE", "Source"}, {"CLASS_CODE", "Class Code"}, {"JOB_STATUS", "Job Status"}, {"START_QUANTITY", "Quantity"}, {"SCHEDULED_START_DATE", "Scheduled Start Date"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}, {"SCHEDULED_COMPLETION_DATE", "Scheduled Completion Date"}, {"LAST_MOVED_DATE", "Last Moved Date"}, {"FIRST_UNIT_START_DATE", "First Unit Start Date"}, {"NET_QUANTITY", "Net Quantity"}, {"QUANTITY_COMPLETED", "Completed Quantity"}, {"QUANTITY_SCRAPPED", "Scrapped Quantity"}, {"QUANTITY_REMAINING", "Remaining Quantity"}, {"PROJECT_NUMBER", "Project Number"}, {"KANBAN_CARD_NUMBER", "Kanban Card Number"}, {"LOT_NUMBER", "Lot Number"}, {"DATE_RELEASED", "Released Date"}, {"DATE_COMPLETED", "Completed Date"}, {"DATE_CLOSED", "Closed Date"}, {"DEMAND_CLASS", "Demand Class"}, {"JOB_CREATED_BY", "Created By"}, {"JOB_LAST_UPDATED_BY", "Last Updated By"}, {"COMPLETION_SUBINVENTORY", "Completion Subinventory"}, {"COMPLETION_LOCATOR", "Completion Locator"}, {"SALES_ORDER_DFF", "Sales Order DFF"}, {"SALES_ORDER_LINE_DFF", "Sales Order Line DFF"}, {"SERVICE_REQUEST_DFF", "Service Request DFF"}, {"ASSEMBLY_SN_DFF", "Assembly Serial Number DFF"}}),
  ConvertToList = Table.AddColumn(#"Renamed columns", "ClassCodeToList", each Text.ToList([Class Code])),
  LowerCaseChars = {"a".."z"},
  // add Character.FromNumber(8203) to make the column unique
  AddInvisibleChars = Table.AddColumn(ConvertToList, "AddInvisibleChars", each List.Transform(
            [ClassCodeToList], 
            each 
            if 
            List.Contains(#"LowerCaseChars", _) 
            then 
            _ & Character.FromNumber(8203) 
            else _
            )),
  // Add case sensitive column as result of adding invisible characters Character.FromNumber(8203)
  AddCaseSensitiveColumn = Table.AddColumn(AddInvisibleChars, "Class Code CS", each Text.Combine([AddInvisibleChars])),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(AddCaseSensitiveColumn, {{"Class Code CS", type text}, {"Completed Quantity", type number}, {"Scrapped Quantity", type number}, {"Remaining Quantity", type number}}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed column type", {"ClassCodeToList", "AddInvisibleChars"}),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns 1";
shared WIP_Value_TBU = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true,
    Query="
      SELECT
         sysdate extract_date,
         from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
         we.wip_entity_name,
         we.wip_entity_id,
         mp.organization_code,
         oap.period_name,
         wpb.acct_period_id,
         oap.period_start_date,
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_material_overhead_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_resource_in),
         SUM(wpb.tl_resource_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_resource_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_outside_processing_in),
         SUM(wpb.tl_outside_processing_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_outside_processing_var),
         SUM(wpb.tl_overhead_in),
         SUM(wpb.tl_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.tl_overhead_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_overhead_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_material_overhead_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_resource_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_resource_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_resource_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_outside_processing_var),
         SUM(wpb.pl_outside_processing_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_outside_processing_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_overhead_in),
         SUM(wpb.pl_overhead_out),
         SUM(wpb.pl_overhead_var)
      FROM
         apps.wip_period_balances wpb,
         inv.mtl_parameters mp,
         apps.wip_entities we,
         apps.org_acct_periods oap
      WHERE
         mp.organization_id = we.organization_id 
         AND wpb.wip_entity_id = we.wip_entity_id 
         AND OAP.organization_id = we.organization_id 
         AND oap.acct_period_id = wpb.acct_period_id
        AND EXISTS (
        SELECT
            1
        FROM
            apps.mtl_item_categories_v mic
        WHERE
                mic.inventory_item_id = we.primary_item_id
            AND mic.organization_id = mp.organization_id
            AND mic.category_set_name IN (
                'Product',
                'ORG Product'
            )
            AND mic.segment1 = '"&TBU&"'
    )
      GROUP BY
        we.wip_entity_name,
         we.wip_entity_id,
         mp.organization_code,
         oap.period_name,
         wpb.acct_period_id,
         oap.period_start_date
    ", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_VAR)", "TL Material Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_OUT)", "TL Material Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "TL Material Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "TL Material Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_RESOURCE_VAR)", "TL Resource Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_VAR)", "TL OSP Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "TL Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_VAR)", "PL Material Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "PL Material Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_RESOURCE_VAR)", "PL Resource Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_VAR)", "PL OSP Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OVERHEAD_VAR)", "PL Overhead Variance"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_RESOURCE_IN)", "TL Resource Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_RESOURCE_OUT)", "TL Resource Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OVERHEAD_IN)", "TL Overhead Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "TL Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_IN)", "TL OSP Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.TL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_OUT)", "TL OSP Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_IN)", "PL Material Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OUT)", "PL Material Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_IN)", "PL Material Overhead Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "PL Material Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_RESOURCE_IN)", "PL Resource Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_RESOURCE_OUT)", "PL Resource Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OVERHEAD_IN)", "PL Overhead Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OVERHEAD_OUT)", "PL Overhead Output"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_IN)", "PL OSP Input"}, {"SUM(WPB.PL_OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_OUT)", "PL OSP Output"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"WIP_ENTITY_NAME", "Job Number"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "Period Name"}, {"PERIOD_START_DATE", "Period Start Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Resource_Transaction = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
    SYSDATE                                                 extract_date, 
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
    mp.organization_code,
    (
        SELECT
            we.wip_entity_name
        FROM
            apps.wip_entities we
        WHERE
            we.wip_entity_id = tr.wip_entity_id
    ) wip_job,
    (
        SELECT
            we.description
        FROM
            apps.wip_entities we
        WHERE
            we.wip_entity_id = tr.wip_entity_id
    ) wip_job_description,
    CASE
        WHEN (
            SELECT
                COUNT(1)
            FROM
                apps.wip_discrete_jobs wdj
            WHERE
                wdj.wip_entity_id = tr.wip_entity_id
        ) > 0 THEN
            'Yes'
        ELSE
            'No'
    END discrete_job_flag,
    msi.segment1       item_number,
    msi.description    item_description,
    tr.reference       resource_trx_reference,
    tr.transaction_id,
    decode(tr.transaction_type, '1', 'Resource transaction', '11', 'Lot Based Split',
           '12', 'Lot Based Merge', '13', 'Lot Based Bonus', '14',
           'Lot Based Quantity Update', '15', 'Estimated Scrap Absorption', '16', 'Estimated Scrap Reallocation',
           '17', 'Direct Shopfloor Delivery', '2', 'Overhead transaction', '3',
           'Outside processing', '4', 'Cost update', '5', 'Period close variance',
           '6', 'Job close variance', '7', 'Final completion variance', NULL) transaction_type,
    tr.transaction_date,
    tr.source_code,
    tr.operation_seq_num,
    tr.resource_seq_num,
    decode(tr.autocharge_type, '1', 'WIP move', '2', 'Manual',
           '3', 'PO receipt', '4', 'PO move', NULL) autocharge_type,
    tr.usage_rate_or_amount,
    decode(tr.basis_type, '1', 'Item', '2', 'Lot',
           '3', 'Resource Units', '4', 'Resource Value', '5',
           'Total Value', '6', 'Activity', NULL) basis_type,
    tr.transaction_quantity,
    tr.transaction_uom,
    tr.primary_quantity,
    tr.primary_uom,
    tr.actual_resource_rate,
    tr.standard_resource_rate,
    decode(tr.standard_rate_flag, 1, 'Yes', 2, 'No',
           tr.standard_rate_flag) standard_rate_flag,
    tr.currency_code,
    (select period_name from
    apps.org_acct_periods              ac
    where tr.acct_period_id = ac.acct_period_id) period_name,
    --al.name,
    --en.wip_entity_name,
    --li.line_code,
    --ac.period_name,
    --sy.segment1,
    --sy.segment1,
    --de.department_code,
    --re.resource_code,
    --alpe.full_name,
    --cac.activity,
    --mtr.reason_name,
  --  pr.project_name,
    --pr.project_number,
    cac.activity,
    tr.attribute_category,
    tr.attribute1,
    tr.attribute2 /* IDS */,
    tr.organization_id,
    tr.wip_entity_id,
    tr.line_id,
    tr.primary_item_id,
    tr.acct_period_id,
    tr.department_id,
    tr.resource_id,
    tr.employee_id,
    tr.activity_id,
    tr.reason_id,
    tr.move_transaction_id,
    tr.completion_transaction_id,
    tr.project_id,
    tr.task_id,
    tr.source_line_id /* WHO */,
    tr.creation_date,
    tr.created_by,
    tr.last_update_date,
    tr.last_updated_by,
    pr.project_name,
    pr.project_number,
    de.department_code,
    re.resource_code,
    (
        SELECT
            wmt.primary_quantity
        FROM
            apps.wip_move_transactions wmt
        WHERE
            tr.move_transaction_id = wmt.transaction_id
    ) move_primary_quantity,
   (
        SELECT
            wmt.fm_operation_seq_num
        FROM
            apps.wip_move_transactions wmt
        WHERE
            tr.move_transaction_id = wmt.transaction_id
    ) fm_operation_seq_num,
   (
        SELECT
            wmt.to_operation_seq_num
        FROM
            apps.wip_move_transactions wmt
        WHERE
            tr.move_transaction_id = wmt.transaction_id
    ) to_operation_seq_num
FROM
    apps.wip_transactions              tr,
    apps.mtl_parameters                mp,
    apps.cst_activities                cac,
    apps.mtl_system_items_b            msi,
    apps.pjmfv_project_mfg_projects    pr,
    apps.bom_resources                 re,
    apps.bom_departments               de
WHERE
        mp.organization_id = tr.organization_id
    AND mp.organization_id = msi.organization_id (+)
    AND tr.primary_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id (+)
    AND tr.project_id = pr.project_id (+)
    AND tr.activity_id = cac.activity_id (+)
    AND tr.organization_id = re.organization_id (+)
    AND tr.resource_id = re.resource_id (+)
    AND tr.organization_id = de.organization_id (+)
    AND tr.department_id = de.department_id (+)
    AND mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"' 
       "
, CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"WIP_JOB", "WIP Job"}, {"DISCRETE_JOB_FLAG", "Discrete Job Flag"}, {"WIP_JOB_DESCRIPTION", "WIP Job Description"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "Period Name"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "Item Description"}, {"RESOURCE_TRX_REFERENCE", "Resource Transaction Reference"}, {"TRANSACTION_TYPE", "Transaction Type"}, {"TRANSACTION_DATE", "Transaction Date"}, {"SOURCE_CODE", "Source Code"}, {"OPERATION_SEQ_NUM", "Operation Sequence"}, {"RESOURCE_SEQ_NUM", "Resource Sequence"}, {"AUTOCHARGE_TYPE", "Autocharge Type"}, {"USAGE_RATE_OR_AMOUNT", "Usage Rate or Amount"}, {"BASIS_TYPE", "Basis Type"}, {"TRANSACTION_QUANTITY", "Transaction Quantity"}, {"TRANSACTION_UOM", "Transaction UOM"}, {"PRIMARY_QUANTITY", "Primary Quantity"}, {"PRIMARY_UOM", "Primary UOM"}, {"ACTUAL_RESOURCE_RATE", "Actual Resource Rate"}, {"STANDARD_RESOURCE_RATE", "Standard Resource Rate"}, {"STANDARD_RATE_FLAG", "Standard Rate Flag"}, {"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency Code"}, {"ACTIVITY", "Activity Name"}, {"CREATED_BY", "Created By"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}, {"PROJECT_NAME", "Project Name"}, {"PROJECT_NUMBER", "Project Number"}, {"DEPARTMENT_CODE", "Department Code"}, {"RESOURCE_CODE", "Resource Code"}, {"MOVE_PRIMARY_QUANTITY", "Move Primary Quantity"}, {"FM_OPERATION_SEQ_NUM", "From Operation Sequence"}, {"TO_OPERATION_SEQ_NUM", "To Operation Sequence"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
